name: Development map layer configuration defined by amche-goa community

layers.title: Live Fire Trucks
layers.description: Live locations of fire trucks from the Directorate of Fire Emergency Services. Location updated every 5 minutes from Goa Fire Trucks API.
layers.attribution: Directorate of Fire & Emergency Services, Govt. of Goa

layers.title: Schools
layers.description: Schools locations by capacity
layers.attribution: Disaster Management Resources and Contacts/Schools, Directorate of Fire & Emergency Services, Govt. of Goa

layers.title: Slope Zoning
layers.description:
Slope zone classification using NASA NASADEM 30m for entire Goa and ISRO CartoDEM 2.5m (Bardez) terrain data for Bardez taluka.
The output is a 30x30m grid indicating the minimum gradient within that cell. Details of the algorithm are in the slope processor script.

layers.title: Goa Community Maps
layers.description: Sketches, maps and plans by the people of Goa
layers.attribution: CC-BY-SA Mapwarper community maps of Goa

layers.title: Regional Development Plan for Goa 2021
layers.description: Regional landuse plan for Goa 2021 (RDP-2021) prepared by the Goa Town & Country Planning Department and notified as per the Goa TCP Act
layers.attribution: Regional Development Plan for Goa 2021, Goa Town & Country Planning Department. Georeferenced using Mapwarper

layers.title: Taluka Land Use Plans 2021
layers.description: Taluka level regional plans
layers.attribution: Regional Development Plan for Goa 2021, Goa Town & Country Planning Department. Georeferenced using Mapwarper

layers.title: Water Body Atlas 2025
layers.description: Springs, lakes and other minor water bodies surveyed by the Department of Water Resources, Government of Goa.
layers.attribution: Water Body Atlas Of Goa, Department of Water Resources

layers.title: Local Body Boundaries
layers.description: Municipal and Panchayat local body boundaries. Please see Gramanchiitra for panchayat demographic profile and information on elected representatives.
layers.attribution: OneMapGoa - Collected by Datameet Community

layers.title: Plots with No Development Slopes
layers.description:
Survey numbers with No Development Slopes (NDS). The output location of plots having atleast 25% of the plot area with NDS or slopes greater than 1:4 (25% slope).
Processed using slope computed with NASADEM 30m data and cadastral boundaries from OneMapGoa GIS. See processing code for details.
layers.attribution: CC-BY Plots with No Development Slopes by amche.in community

layers.title: Cadastral Plot Boundaries
layers.description: Cadastral Boundaries from the Department of Land Records. The map is provided for information purpose only. An official copy can be obtained from Goa Online and Directorate of Settlement & Land Records (Form 1 & 14)
layers.attribution: OneMapGoa GIS - Collected by Datameet Community

layers.title: Communidade Lands (Bhunaksha)
layers.description: Land parcels with Bhunaksha RoR includes 'Communidade' in the list of occupant info.
layers.attribution: Communidades of Goltim and Saligao

layers.title: Communidade Land
layers.description: Land parcels governed by the Code of Communidades. Prepared using survey numbers submitted by the following communidadeds: Goltim, Saligao.
layers.attribution: Communidades of Goltim and Saligao

layers.title: Notified Private Forests
layers.description: Private forests identified by Thomas and Arujao expert committees
layers.attribution: Goa Private Forest Plots - Collected by Amche.in Community

layers.title: Notified wetland buffer areas
layers.description: Maps of notified wetland 50m buffer zones and 10m zones of influence. Only Pilerne Lake is available currently.
layers.attribution: Gazette Notifications, Goa State Wetland Authority. Georeferenced using Mapwarper

layers.title: Bund Sluice Gates
layers.description:
Sluice gates for notified bunds existing before 1991 from Goa CZMP.
Note: Not yet verified against certified maps by the Department of Water Resources and lists by the Department of Agriculture , Government of Goa - Collected via RTI by Goa Foundation
layers.attribution: Final CZMP, Goa Coastal Zone Management Authority - via Maphub

layers.title: Notified Khazan Bunds
layers.description:
Notified and private Khazan Bunds from Goa CZMP.
Note: Not yet verified against certified maps by the Department of Water Resources and lists by the Department of Agriculture , Government of Goa - Collected via RTI by Goa Foundation
layers.attribution: Final CZMP, Goa Coastal Zone Management Authority - via Maphub

layers.title: Notified Khazan Lands
layers.description:
Notified and protected Khazan Lands from Goa CZMP.
Note: Not yet verified against certified maps by the Department of Water Resources and lists by the Department of Agriculture , Government of Goa - Collected via RTI by Goa Foundation
The ground truthing of the Marginal bunds, sluice gates and the defended Khazan lands was carried out by the Water Resources Department, along with the Members of Bio Diversity, Surveyors of DSLR. Soil Conservation Engineers of the Agriculture department, Forest officials.

It is further certified that the ground truthing is carried with details enumerated on the Toposheets published by the Survey of India in the year 1964, Cadastral village maps published by the land survey department in the year 1972-76. The Khazan land, bunds sluice gates mapped by the village Panchayat were also used utilised for identification and ground truthing. Thus, the Bunds/Sluice gates and Khazan Lands shown in this map are verified and it is certified that the Bunds and Sluice gates shown in this map exist now and were constructed in the past, prior to the date of notification issued vide S. O. 114(E) dated 19th February 1999.
layers.attribution: Final CZMP, Goa Coastal Zone Management Authority - via Maphub

layers.title: CRZ-1A Protected Areas
layers.description: Protected coastal features of mangroves, sand dunes, mudflats, salt pans, corals, nesting sites and archaeological sites falling under CRZ-1A zone from Goa CZMP. View Coastal Sand Dunes of Goa Report by NCSCM - Collected via RTI by Goa Foundation for more information.
layers.attribution: Final CZMP, Goa Coastal Zone Management Authority - via Datameet Community

layers.title: Forest Map Of Goa 2007
layers.description: Forest Survey Map Of Goa 2007 by Forest Department of Goa. Map shows administrative jurisdiction limits and divisions of the forest of Goa. Map also includes details of revenue village divisions (outlined red) and major roads (yellow). See File:Forest_Cover_Map_Of_Goa_2007.jpg
layers.attribution: File:Forest_Cover_Map_Of_Goa_2007.jpg via MapWarper

layers.title: Goa Harbour Admiralty Chart (1775)
layers.description: Nautical chart of the West Coast of India from Achra River to Cape Ramas. Surveyed by Lieut. A.D. Taylor 1853-4 for Eat India Company. Not current - not to be used for navigation!
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: Admiralty Chart No 793 Goa Harbour, with a View, Published 1775 via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain
